content.raw:
* /multisense_sl/fps   ... sets the rate of the camera image
* /multisense_sl/set_spindle_speed ... sets the rate of the spinde speed

I suggest the former be changed to "set_fps" for consistency.

Also the sandia hand cameras don't have channels to set their rates:

* /sandia_hands/l_hand/set_fps

* /sandia_hands/r_hand/set_fps

They are also not rate limited - they generate images different rates (e.g. I've seen 50Hz).
